medium: White and brown oil and black chalk on brown prepared paper
title: Madonna and Child
marks:
Inscription and Stamp

Inscribed on verso, in pe
description: dark image of head and upper torso of Madonna with hair in braided updo, holding Christ Child near her PL shoulder; Christ Child has PL hand raised, with index finger pointing; reddish-brown ground with grey figures
creditline: Gift of funds from an anonymous donor and the Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
